treatments_requested.name: Gene Testing
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Molecular gene testing to determine if MDS is primary or secondary

treatments_tried_but_failed.name: Standard Testing
treatments_tried_but_failed.other_or_notes: Did not clarify if MDS is primary or secondary

guidelines_details: NCCN guidelines recommend molecular gene testing in appropriate cases.
rationale: The gene panel testing was likely to be more beneficial for treatment of the patient’s medical condition than any available standard therapy. The Health Plan’s denial should be overturned.
reviewer_credentials: Physician reviewers are board certified in internal medicine with sub-specialty certification in medical oncology and are actively practicing.
